name: places/ChIJ8RmuEcpZwokRoFOIUea1QBc
formattedAddress: 57 W 57th St Suite 326, New York, NY 10019, USA
adrFormatAddress: 57 W 57th St Suite 326, New York, NY 10019, USA

originalText.text:
Let me start off by saying this was my first Bespoke suit fitting and I wasn’t sure what to expect. I needed a suit for my wedding and waited until I was a month out to start looking (don’t be like me, lol). A friend of mine had suggested contacting Denzel and I AM SO GLAD I DID. He made the experience so FUN and personalized! He took what felt like a hundred measurements to ensure my suit fit like a glove. I was obviously a little bit nervous given it was my wedding and I didn’t give him much turnaround time, but every step along the way Denzel assured me I’d be stepping down the aisle in style… and he doesn’t lie! My wife and onlookers were stunned looking at my suit. The fabrics and attention to details are unparalleled. Whether you have a concrete idea of what you want your suit to look like or just an abstract one; Denzel is a highly collaborative and creative type with a sharp eye that will help you fill in the gaps!

I just want to personally thank Denzel for helping make my wedding day perfect, being patient with me as I asked a million questions about the process, and educating me along the way!

text.text:

My wife and onlookers were stunned looking at my suit. The fabrics and attention to details are unparalleled. Whether you have a concrete idea of what you want your suit to look like or just an abstract one; Denzel is a highly collaborative and creative type with a sharp eye that will help you fill in the gaps!

originalText.text: Right from the start this was an absolutely amazing experience. Denzel is very personable and easy to talk to which makes the process much smoother. There are so many options to go thru when designing the suit which is very fun and reassuring that you’re getting exactly what you want. The process gives the suit a very custom, one of a kind feel, which is exactly what it is. Denzel really takes his time with you and thanks to the whole process we were able to craft a very beautiful suit that was exactly what I wanted. I bought it to wear to a wedding and it definitely helped me stand out stylishly. It was an overall 12/10 experience and I plan on buying from Denzel Honoré Bespoke next time I need a new suit. Denzel is a great guy and I only have positive things to say about the whole experience.

originalText.text:
Suit came out amazing, gotten amazing feedback so far. Fitting & going through the design with him was very easy. Ended up with something that checked all of the boxes for me.

When we made a last minute change to the bowtie, Denzel was able to expedite shipping it to the West Coast with a lot of time to spare. Excited for the big day in a couple weeks!

originalText.text: Highly recommend Denzel Honoré Bespoke for their amazing quality and customization - my favorites are the high end silk shirts that are unbeatable quality wise! Will be back

text.text: Highly recommend Denzel Honoré Bespoke for their amazing quality and customization - my favorites are the high end silk shirts that are unbeatable quality wise! Will be back

originalText.text: First, I would like to say BeSpoke is the best with the custom suits. He will make sure every measurement from your ankles to your neck is perfect. Denzel has so many different options to pick from. The turn around is very fast and he will be in contact with you through the whole time. Great Person and Great Customer Service. Can’t wait to order my next suit. Thank you
